LanguageData.WNA_FabricBaseboard.label: attunement fabric baseboard
LanguageData.WNA_FabricBaseboard.description: A baseboard used for replicating WNA's attunement fabric. In a remote place like rimworld, such thing is a must in fabric pruduction.
LanguageData.WNA_Focus.label: focus
LanguageData.WNA_Focus.description: Attention, concentration. Focused and solidfied, and carefully contained for further use or preservation.
LanguageData.WNA_HalogenVial.label: halogen vial
LanguageData.WNA_HalogenVial.description: A mixture (maybe) of halogen contained in a vial. These substances are among the most active substances in the world, hard to handle, and very useful.
LanguageData.WNA_MercuryVial.label: mercury vial
LanguageData.WNA_MercuryVial.description: An unique metal that usually appear as liquid. This substance easily volatile and it's steam is highly poisonous, so needs to be carefully contained or operated.
LanguageData.WNA_Methanol.label: methanol
LanguageData.WNA_Methanol.description: The simplest alcohol, a very useful chemical substance, can be obtained by distilling wood, poisonous. DO remember that this is absolutely not for drinking.
LanguageData.WNA_ParticleVial.label: particle vial
LanguageData.WNA_ParticleVial.description: Strange unstable particles found when mass is diluted into energy under certain conditions. Can be safely stored in a magnetic vial, just don't let this vial be destroyed.
LanguageData.WNA_Phosphorus.label: white phosphorus
LanguageData.WNA_Phosphorus.description: Very soft substance. This substance is very dangerous, highly toxic and highly flammable, makes it hard to believe that phosphorus is a vital component of life.
LanguageData.WNA_PreservedBrain.label: preserved brain
LanguageData.WNA_PreservedBrain.description: A biological human brain, carefully treated with methanol and neutroamine and preserved, to keep as much of its vitality for further use.
LanguageData.WNA_Quicklime.label: quicklime
LanguageData.WNA_Quicklime.description: A hardly soluble, highly alkaline substance, has much as wide applications as much as great potential hazards.
LanguageData.WNA_Sulphur.label: sulphur
LanguageData.WNA_Sulphur.description: Brittle yellow substance, toxic, smelly, and an essential component of living organisms. However this doesn't mean you should eat sulphur directly.
LanguageData.WNA_UraniumBattery.label: vitalized uranium battery
LanguageData.WNA_UraniumBattery.description: Some uranium stored in a safe container. These uranium is vitalized by strange unstable particles, emitting great energy but will exaust quickly. Don't take it apart before it exausts entirely. You've been warned.
